main_menu.notify: We want to notify you of new messages in the chat rooms. Turn on notifications to stay up to date with new messages from your friends and chat members!
main_menu.disabled_info: You have blocked notifications for this application. To avoid missing important messages and updates from other users in the chats, please enable notifications in your browser settings.
main_menu.transfer_info:
There is no private key on this device. 
You can scan the QR code from another device, 
where there's already a key. 

1) Open the settings on the other device.
2) Select "Generate QR Code for Private Key".
3) Scan the code 4 times on this device.

content.1: - The password should be complex but memorable.
content.2: - It is not stored on our servers and we cannot recover it.
content.3: - Without this password, you will not be able to decrypt your private key.
content.title: Create a password to encrypt your private key
content.subtitle: To protect your private key, create a strong password. You will need it when you restore access on another device.
